name: PACHYCEPHALOSAURUS GAME
description:
HIT. EVERYTHING.

In this parody of Dinosaur Game (or Chrome Dino), you are a Pachycefalosaurus (one of those dinosaurs with the super-tough skulls) and, instead of dodging the obstacles, you have to hit them all! Headbutt your way through this comical endless runner!

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • W/Up/Space to jump
  • S/Down in the air to descend faster
  • Bonus points if you use Chrome, haha! (Well, not actual in-game bonus points. I just think it would be funny)

CREDITS

A game by LudosGD! Art and code by me :D

Developed with Godot Game Engine

Sound effects:

  •  8bit Jump by plasterbrain (https://freesound.org/people/plasterbrain/sounds/399095/)
  • 8-bit Explosion1 by timgormly (https://freesound.org/people/timgormly/sounds/170145/) (User under Creative Commons License 3.0)
  • Retro video game sfx - Fail by OwlStorm (https://freesound.org/people/OwlStorm/sounds/404743/)
  • 8-bit "failure" sound by ProjectsU012 (https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/333785/) (Used under Creative Commons License 4.0)

Font: Press Start 2P by CodeMan38 

Thank you very much for playing, have a wonderful day! :D
